tool_description: Monitors and analyzes competitor pricing across multiple products and channels to inform competitive pricing decisions and market positioning.

monitoring_channels.description: Sales channels to monitor for competitor prices

price_change_threshold.description: Minimum percentage change to flag as significant

error_messages: Empty monitoring lists: target_products, competitor_names, and monitoring_channels cannot be empty.
Invalid threshold: price_change_threshold must be greater than 0.
Channel access error: Unable to access one or more specified monitoring channels.
usage: Specify target_products, competitor_names, and monitoring_channels to track. Set price_change_threshold to control sensitivity of change detection.
